name: This Loop (TM)
description:
Enjoy the soothing visual novel activities of participating in an interdepartmental meeting at Clockwork Inc, the leaders in their field. Strengthen friendships, learn your coworkers’ names, and try to figure out which one of them is a murderer. Good luck!

CW: Cartoon depiction of blood and mentions of death

My first functioning visual novel, made for Ludum Dare 47 "Stuck in a Loop." There are a few branches missing, but I made sure to include the important info from them to finish the game.

No sound for now.

Revision midnight October 5: Fixing some unintended loops from missing Ink code
